wikipedia_page.main: Gavin McGowan (born 16 January 1976 in Blackheath, England) is an English retired professional  footballer who played as a defender. McGowan featured for Arsenal in the Premier League and for Luton Town in the Football League Second Division.

response: On leaving Luton, Locke joined fellow ex-Hatter Gavin McGowan at Isthmian League Division One North side Hornchurch.
